content:
The Earthmover team will be in Denver next week for an offsite, so we are hosting a happy hour. The event will be on Wednesday, March 12th, at 7 PM MST. We will be serving food (tacos) and drinks. We hope to see you there! Please register here: Denver Geospatial Happy Hour Â· Luma

Come chat with us about Icechunk, serving Zarr data over standard protocols, earth system data analysis, and other fun stuff!
